website_summaries.verdict: Manufactured by a company known for quality commercial grade machines, it has the build and performance to make perfect snow cones that tops all of the competitors.
pros: Sports a precisely engineered motor and precision stainless steel blades in a compact unit that produces lots of fluffy shaved ice in seconds
Comes with ice shaper, spoons, and flavor syrups
cons: It's expensive and a bit loud to operate
otherwise you'd be hard pressed to find quality concerns about this outstanding little machine

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny! Shaves The Best Snow! Very Fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shaver! Makes fluffy snow that is light and easy to eat with no ice chunks floating around! Build quality is great everything feels sturdy and feels it will last! Replaceable blade is also a nice feature. The price seems a bit high for a shaver but trust me it is worth it! The included syrup samples taste great (i have ordered 8 pints of snowie syrup since).
customer_reviews.author: Techout

customer_reviews.title: I love this little work horse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little work horse! I own a small shaved ice business and this little Snowie gets the job done! Smooth, soft, consistent shaved ice each time. I used it at an event with over 2,000 in attendance and my company served nearly 500; this little machine grind through ice like it was nothing! I love this product for everything that it boasts, unique design, powerful motor, easy-carry handle, dome ice shaper! I totally recommend Snowie products, and I love all the information provided by Snowie on Youtube and the website; it makes me feel there's help available if needed. Sincerely, Lorrie, S.A. Texas
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Not as well built as when they were first made...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first model as soon as it came out. It came with a 3 year warranty and was built well with steel parts inside the hopper. 2 1/2 years later, we moved and the movers broke it. So, I ordered another. This one only came with a one year warranty and the parts that were once stainless steel are now plastic. I am very unhappy that this company decided to take shortcuts.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Burney

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machine!
customer_reviews.text: This shaved ice is fine enough for my liking. We love to eat ice but it’s hard on the teeth. This machine is FAST although quite loud but we are unbothered by it. We have used it to fill up a cooler with snowballs this summer and it’s been a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is awesome!!! Works like a dream, no set up at all! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: k.white

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever for those hot days
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever for those hot days. My kids are even using it to help them earn a little extra cash this summer. Who wants lemonade when you can have a snow cone!
customer_reviews.author: Kamesha Fontenette

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Our Snowie arrived in a timely manner. It was packaged well. Making a snowball,however, was a hot mess. The shaved ice came out like snow diarrhea. We contacted customer support as the manufacturer requested. We were told "our ice needed to be wetter"??? WTHeck? So we buy bagged ice. Tried again. We then wet our ice AND the bagged ice. Snow diarrhea every time. We returned it and I am waiting IMPATIENTLY for my refund. We will buy another brand when it arrives. We do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Parts Missing -- no metal blade to shave ice!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for my Grandkids. We opened the box and everything appeared in order. However, we could not get shaved ice. Instead; the ice cubes were 'spit' out the opening where the shaved ice is supposed to be. Nothing seemed out of order. However, when I looked at the photo on the box -- not in any instruction booklet -- I noticed that the metal blades that shave the ice were missing! Not a great gift. Struggling to return via Amazon as I purchased the item months ago as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: FDean Simpson

customer_reviews.title: The caring
customer_reviews.text: Hi Jared thank you for caring it’s nice in this day and age , I have used the machine once so far for my wife and daughter everyone was happy , I somehow envisioned a mat for underneath and plastic cups I think I saw on YouTube in a review prob my error .. I wish I’d have ordered it earlier in the summer but it’ll still get used and for adult slushes too , next time I think I’m going to order the gallon jugs with the pump I saw but anyway great product Jared thank you once again for the follow up and caring attention...Dave in Miami
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Best machine ! Works just as good as big machines! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I have ever written . This little machine is awesome. I pulled up to the talent show at my kids school and the moms were like that thing is going to make a bunch on shaved ice???? And it did. It made about 50 cups. It was over a few hours but it kept going . A few times the ice got stuck but it was an easy fix. Its small and super easy to use. Sooooo glad I did my research and bought this one! This company is serious about snow cones and shaved ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum yum! 3rd one I have purchased. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with "Island Snow" in Kaliua, Oahu, Hawaii. I ordered this from Amazon while I was on island. I came home to this amazing machine. May not be "Island Snow", but it is pretty close for the mainland. I love that I could just use regular ice cubes. It shaved ice very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy!!!!!! Convenient!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ice is so fluffy and perfect. Holds the flavors. So convenient to use ice cubes!! The size of the machine fits perfectly in my cupboard. I chose this one over the block ice machines and am so happy I did. I'll use it way more and my 8 year old daughter can make snowies for her friends without my help! You have to spend money to get this quality fluffy snow. I had cheap show cone machines with the manual crank and those are terrible. This snowie machine is just on another level.
customer_reviews.author: pkz

customer_reviews.title: This little unit makes a shaved ice.
customer_reviews.text: We recently visited Hawaii and fell in love with shaved ice. This little machine is the next best thing to a commercial unit. My family loves it. We like it so much that we are thinking about buying a second unit so that both sets of grandchildren can have one at each of their houses. So easy to use and makes piles of ice in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Barry N Lindley

customer_reviews.title: $199.99 paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Product came in complete and undamaged box. Followed simple directions.......nothing! Called snowy directly, they said it was a bad switch and return to amazon directly. Seemed to be a common issue. This is over priced for what you get. A motor, a switch, a power cord, small blade and some plastic. Seems like a case of cutting quality for increased profits and/or poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fluffy ice
customer_reviews.text: Nice fluffy ice. Wear your earplugs! Loud! I would have purchased the old school Hawaiin shave ice machine that carves from blocks. Not as convenient but a much better experience overall I would imagine.
customer_reviews.author: greg schilly

customer_reviews.title: LOOOVE this. Everything I thought it'd be and more!
customer_reviews.text: Other than this being extremely loud - it is shaving ice cubes flying around in a plastic container - I LOVE this! I use this every day, no joke. I think I've already saved money in the amount of times I buy slurpees and slushies, not to mention all the cups I am reusing. I never used the flavor packs because I only use juice in my slushees, but the little bottles are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: It does shave ice the way I want but...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ice shaver as I purchase one prior to this with a handle that pressing down into a chute, BUT that ice crusher did not shave the ice into snow flakes, like this Little Snowie. However, just be forewarned that as it spins the ice and shaves, it is very noisy as the ice is tossed around plastic housing because of it's fast centrifugal force of shaving the ice. It DOES what the company claims, but what you don't know initially is that it's loud when shaving the ice, but I love the desserts it makes with the ice so I will take the good with the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Arlington P

customer_reviews.title: Snows cone machine
customer_reviews.text: I got this item a month ago and it’s not working we can’t to figure out what is the problem with
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snow! Perfect for Halo-halo (Filipino Dessert)!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Family uses this mainly to make awesome Halo-halo (Filipino Dessert) and great Mais-con-yelo! This machine makes the perfect Crushed Ice/Snow that when the ingredients are mixed, it has that fine texture. Unlike other brands, leaves that random uncrushed ice that feels very hard and huge for your teeth to bite on. Also great for a Snow Cone mixed with vanilla ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: Lem Nacionales

customer_reviews.title: Makes great, non-chunky  "snow"!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has very high standards when it comes to snow cones. He want the ice to be like snow, without chunks. We tried another machine that got good reviews, but the ice was chunky so we sent it back. We almost gave up, but thought we'd give this one a try, and much to my husband's surprise (and my relief at finding something that met his standards) this machine works great! It's very easy to use and produces "snow". Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I got addicted to shaved ice. So, I love this little machine. It is LOUD as others said but I keep a pair of headphones to protect my hearing. It’s that loud! But I love this machine. It’s safe & would be hard to be unsafe unless you were just an idiot! After I use mine, I turn upside down in my sink so it can dry & have had 8-9 months & used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a kids birthday party. They loved it. It uses regular ice cubes and is super simple to use. The machine was out of its internal packaging, which leads me to to believe that it was a return. Also was missing the powder sticks and the shovel-spoons. Luckily I had purchased other syrups and spoon-straws because I was expecting many kids.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene

customer_reviews.title: Ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Have u ordered a snowball and the ice was bit large, I mean small but was small beads if ice? This is a Ice Shaver! I mean shaved! No beads of ice, pure smooth ice. If you can imagine that. It just melts in your mouth similar to cotton candy, you know that feel. It is commercial grade and that could be the reason it is first class ice shaver too! It's expensive but well worth the money. It's not just for children either! I'm senior citizen and I love it! I use sugar free black berry/ cranberry juice, it's excellent drink with shaved ice.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I read many reviews on different ice shavers. I kept coming back to what I thought would be dependable and work the best. It costs more but worth every penny. We tried to shave ice with our Kitchenaid mixer attachments. It worked somewhat but it was irritating to have to push the ice through it. So we decided that would be a feature we did not want on our ice shaver. This one requires you to hold the lid down but that is only to make it run. Not to push the ice through. We use ice from the ice maker. It works great. We thoroughly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Q.

customer_reviews.title: Who needs to pay $4 for a frozen mango lemonade?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put off buying this little beauty for close to year and it was definitely worth the wait. I’ve always liked those frozen mango lemonade drinks from Applebee’s restaurants but was always disappointed with my blender’s ability to crush ice. Well Applebee’s will have to find another way to entice me to frequent their establishment because now I can make my own frozen mango lemonade. Thanks to the Lil’ Snowie 2 I can make all my fancy drinks and please the kids with snow cones/raspas, too!
customer_reviews.author: MacDood

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: I gave the snowcone maker to my sister for her birthday. It’s great for adult drinks. It’s really easy to use, very lightweight, and seems very stable. It’s a little noisy, but the end result is worth it! She’s planning to take it over to the neighbors when they go for happy hour. It’s a fun thing for the entire family not just kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice Shaver
customer_reviews.text: EXPENSIVE but in my experience, worth the money if you have kids and plan to make much shaved-ice treats. The lesser-expensive shavers are just not worth the money in my experience. This one is noisy (like they all are) but makes excellent, very fine shavings. I rated clean-up at a 4 as anything not self-cleaning to me is a pain! :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Gould

customer_reviews.title: So easy to make great tasting snow cones!
customer_reviews.text: My two boys LOVE snow cones! We got the Little Snowie for my son’s 10th birthday and it was a great purchase! Super simple to operate and it makes excellent quality snow cones just like the ones we are used to purchasing from commercial places. We just use ice cubes straight from our freezer and in 30 seconds we have excellent quality snow cones. One word of warning, the machine is EXTREMELY loud.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Field

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product!! We used this at Two different Birthday parties and it was a huge hit. It was extremely hot today and all the kids were so happy. Made it all worth it. Any cubed ice will work and it is extremely fast. The flavor packets included were a huge help. All the adults ask where I got it and are amazed at how well it works. Once the kids were satisfied I took a picture and filled it half way with snow and mixed pre-mixed margaritas. What a fun time for all. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Philliesphan302

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the product yet. The video implies it’s made in USA. Attaching photo that clearly shows it’s made in China. I paid the extra to support an American company. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Makes really fluffy snow
customer_reviews.text: This was a "family present" for my youngest childs second birthday (bc lets keep it real we dont need more toys). I was hesitant because the price of this is significantly more than others. I have only had it for a couple months but it seems super durable and we have gotten so much use out of it already. A perfect summer treat. The snow is truly powdery snow not small ice chips. We like most of the syrup flavors that came with it but also have been making our own fresh fruit syrups. Yummy :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real powdery snow!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking high and low for an ice machine that made snow. I love ice and eat it weekly, but most of the machines I purchased didn't get the ice fine enough to enjoy daily. The Little Snowy 2 solved that problem and brought me great joy! Buuut, it's been six months and the blade just went out! I am need someone from the company to contact me to help replace the blade because even though it's a great price, I don't want to have to replace whole machine every six months at $200 a pop! Help!
customer_reviews.author: Umm Juwayriyah

customer_reviews.title: LOUD; but perfect every other way
customer_reviews.text: VERY loud ...no one sleeps if you’re using this. Lol. It does a fantastic job and I have no complaints. Easy to use, easy to let air dry when done. It will continue to drain so leave sitting over edge sink and walk away. Nice carry handle on back (we take back and forth to lake on weekends). Comes with 6 small samples (2 uses each sample). If you want a real one that should last you years it’s well worth the money. Wish it was more affordable for more families. My 24yr old said “It’s like eating snow”. I think she visits for the snow cones I make. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Vkesu

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ice Shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is, effectively, a pro-sumer appliance. High quality construction and performance. This is the third ice shaver we've either used or owned, and it is the best performing. The first one required a large block of ice, the second one didnt really shave the ice but crush it into unequal pieces. This one creates a fine, snowy pile of ice shavings. Perfect. The exterior is plastic, but the internals and blade are all metal. And it is easy to clean and dry. Fam loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect powdery snow cones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas. Best gift ever. She and all her friends use it daily, multiple times per day. My wife and I use it too when they're not using it. I've read other reviews where people complain about cleaning the machine. I'm a little confused as the only thing to touch the machine is ice cubes. We simply wipe the machine dry, or let it drip dry and wipe the counter. So far so good, hoping the Snowie will last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Cadmes

customer_reviews.title: Best shaved ice by far
customer_reviews.text: I love this snow cone machine it's so compact and makes the shave ice very fine. As close as you can get to Hawaiian shaved ice. My family got it for my birthday and we all love it. Always a big hit everytime we use it. Super easy to clean and I love that you can just take ice right out of the ice maker and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy snow cones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a backyard bbq and movie night. It was 96 degrees out and we used this little beauty non-stop. Held up to the task. Very fast and easy. Downside is super loud and it needs a drip plate. The first one I received didn't work at all so had to re-order and pay expedited shipping fee to have in time for the party. Plug it in right away to make sure it works.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chunovich

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Got to say I was sticker shocked over the price at first. Using it though changed my mind. Built to last. This machine takes regular ice cubes (no special prep) and turns it into fine snow. No ice chunks but SNOW. Is it loud? Yes! But it make snow cones so fast it is not an issue. No special cleaning. Just wipe it! Hope it lasts because the kids from the block all want snow cones now so we use it so much almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mattyg3535

customer_reviews.title: Its loud!
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine but boy is it loud!!! It makes nice light and fluffy snow quickly but it is loud. Very expensive so I hope it lasts. They say you can buy replacement blades, via their website, down the road if it stops making fluffy snow. Super easy to use but boy is it loud. Did I mention it is loud? Seems sturdy and is a nice size. Not too big but not small either. We make snow all the time for our drinks, not for snow cones so I'm hoping it is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: 🌈 Lovely and Powerful Little Snowball Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love snowballs! Bought this machine so that I can make at home for family, friends and myself. Machine comes pre-assembled; just remove from box/wrapping, plug in and start making snowballs. The consistency of the ice is not course at all, it is more like the texture of snow. Once syrup applied, the snowball did not melt quickly. A perfect treat for these hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiGirl007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Having fun making snow cones for our grand kids. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for my grandchildren and they absolutely love it. They live in the Dallas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my grandchildren and they absolutely love it. They live in the Dallas, TX area and it gets hot there and to relieve the heat the snow cones hit the spot. They say the shaved ice is totally the same as what you would get at a snow cone stand. Their mother really like that she can use ice cubes to make the shaved ice. This unit is a hit with mom and the kids. I strongly recommend the Snowie Little 2 Ice Shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and fast!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, fast, compact snowball machine. It shaves the ice very nicely....powdery. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for our church to use during our Harvest (Halloween) Carnival and for a few other times through the year. We recently held a car show and used the Little Snowie machine for several hours straight. I love the machine, and especially the fact that it doesn't need a specialty ice product to use. Simply put a scoop of ice cubes in the hopper press down and your making snow. It's easy, Super easy to clean and best of all it doesn't weigh a hundred pounds like the old fashioned snow cone machines. Our church folks loved it.
customer_reviews.author: PreacherRick

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the little snowie 2 alot great for the kids easy to use, the noise is terrible but it only runs a minute. Block of ice work better then cubes so put a 16 oz container in the freezer and use that. It's also good for people who want something and are watching there weight just get the sugar free syrup. we use this alot and and have had if for a couple of months and love it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hoefling

customer_reviews.title: Great shave ice maker for home use
customer_reviews.text: Snowie 2 is small, light and veryeasy to use. I use ice cubes from the freezer and the result is 90% as good as commercial shaved ice in Hawaii. Very quickly produces a generally veryt fine shaving which absorbs the flavorings well and has very good texture. Perfect for home, party use.
customer_reviews.author: brad  Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I love snow cones and used to buy them frequently. I moved and don't have a snow cone place anymore. I knew I wanted a shaved ice maker to make my own at home. This machine is amazing! The ice is light, fluffy, and snow like not crunchy or crushed ice like. It takes just normal ice straight out of the freezer so no prep or planning ahead! It's so easy to use my 6 and 7 year olds can do it! Cleaning is a dream, I just dump out the ice I didn't use and tip it over to let it dry out! So happy that I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product just stopped working after the support expired.
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after a year. So sad this product does not offer warranty. not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great texture of ice shaving
customer_reviews.text: The shave ice ("snow") made from this machine was great. It was very close to a Hawaiian style shave ice--with snowy texture, not like the small chips of ice that come from many machines. The sound was quiet too. I'm very happy with this model; even made shave ice for our neighbors. A great summer treat in days of COVID too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Yamaguchi

customer_reviews.title: At home snowcones like professional machines!
customer_reviews.text: We were married in Hawaii last year and LOVED the shaved ice there because it was like fine powdery snow not coarse ice crystals and the fresh fruit syrups they used..the Snowie 2 makes snowcones like the ones we had in Hawaii! I’m going to make my own fresh fruit syrups and dream of Hawaii! Love this product, it will be great by the pool and for my grand daughters birthday in the middle of 100 degrees summer.
customer_reviews.author: Raven7146

customer_reviews.title: Much MUCH better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: The LIttle Snowie 2 is amazing. I was expecting, at best, much coarser ice grains since the machine uses cubed ice. I was blown away. You get a fluffy, very fine, powdery snow. It is incredible. Better than the majority of snowcones you buy from stands. And it is fast. Highest recommendation available for this machine. Mine will be putting out super cool treats for our camp at Burning Man.
customer_reviews.author: clreindeer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4-year grandson's birthday. It was a hit! Worked perfectly out of the box and the kids had a great time selecting their flavors. Adults loved it too! Sample bottles are small so if you are planning on a crowd, I suggest ordering more syrup so you won't run out (I ordered the Jelly Bean flavors). Love the little shovel type spoons that came with the shaver. This little machine is made well and can tuck underneath cabinetry if you want to leave it out. Footprint is about the size of my stand mixer. We used ice right from the refrigerator icemaker and we had perfect cones. It is a little expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LJS from SC

customer_reviews.title: Chunky compared snow and very loud
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the little snowie 2 cause it was not as advertised that it was gonna be fine fluffy snow like texture. My little snowie 2 made compacted crunchy ice and the shovel spoon was not able to scoop the ice easily it was really hard. I guess I got a bad one cause everyone with good review says that theirs one gave fluffy snow. Also the machine was louder than expected. Other than that it was easy to clean and easy to put ice into. I might buy another one to see if it will give fluffy ice but if they are both the sesame I will just sell both.
customer_reviews.author: Jojode29

customer_reviews.title: perfect shaved ice!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second little Snowie, I purchased my first one over ten years ago and it still works perfectly. I gave it to a family member when I purchased the newer version. These machines are the best on the market and produce perfect shaved ice every time. It takes approximately five seconds to fill a 12 oz cup with ice so you can serve a lot of people very quickly. I have tried a variety of favors over the years and with out a doubt the Snowie syrups are the best tasting. I would highly recommend this machine to anyone looking for a shaved ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wampler

customer_reviews.title: A real shave ice treat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! I just got back from a trip to Hawaii where I ended each day with a shave ice from one of the many amazing places on the island. When I got back to the mainland recreating that shave ice was at the top of my list. After researching half a day on amazon I settled on the Little Snowie 2 and it has not disappointed. Soft, true shaved ice is what I get from this little gem. My kids love it and we have been treating ourselves regularly to shave ice. I also have loved the snowie syrup flavors the best also!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2read

customer_reviews.title: Loud but fast! And easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Very loud when ice is crushing but super fast! Done in seconds. Beautiful snowy ice. Flavors are ok, make sure you have 6 cups of sugar on hand and 6 empty water bottles with caps to re-use to make their syrups. Tigers blood tastes like coconut and cherry mixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!! Best I every had. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Omg this machine well worth the money. This is no cheap Walmart snowcone make this thing is a monster. Regular ice cubes made into soft fluffy snow. Little pricey but I see why though heavy duty machine. Not only good for now cones but for adult drinks to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great snow maker!
customer_reviews.text: This machine turns ice into a snowy like substance, not at all like a snow cone. Great for the kids and adults. I've heard it's also great for adult beverages, although I don't drink. It's very noisy, but you can use ice straight from the freezer and the consistency is very close to shaved ice machines costing thousands. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the Little Snowie 2 very long, just received it last week, but so far it is wonderful and family and friends love it. Time wil tell how it holds out to normal household use.
customer_reviews.author: Senbei

customer_reviews.title: Hydration Officer to the Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Little Snowie is presently on duty as the Hydration Officer at the U.S. Army's Fort Polk (Louisiana) military installation. Officer Snowie provides contractor employees and military personnel that conduct critical military unit readiness training at the base with rapid relief from the high heat and humidity. Officer Snowie began his tour of duty at Fort Polk roughly two weeks ago and has quickly developed a huge following of appreciative military and contractor personnel!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Snow Cones!
customer_reviews.text: The ice comes out like a professional machine, just like you would get at a carnival. First time users, easily make their own. You fill the ice bowl with ice, put the snow cone cup in place and close the cover. It comes on and the snow cone is created. Open the cover and it stops. Then the real fun begins by choosing and mixing the flavors! My favorite is tiger blood (Strawberry and Cherry mixed together).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Happiest Adult Alive
customer_reviews.text: My favorite treat in the entire world is ice cones. I have been looking for a machine Donau could make them at home, but I didn't want the machines that leave chunks of ice... I wanted an ice cone just like snow. The Little Snowie has made me the happiest adult alive. I love this machine. Also it is super safe for kids to use, so as a mother I don't have to worry about someone getting hurt. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jordnorm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You’re shaving ice, it will be noisy, however, best shaved ice out there
customer_reviews.author: darel burdge

customer_reviews.title: Great product made by a great family operated company!
customer_reviews.text: Makes really nice snow really fast. Mix it with a home made syrup and you basically got high quality sorbet. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Bitcoin

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work makes nice snow. However after receiving I feel it is extremely high priced for the quality. I also do not like that it vibrates terribly when ice runs low in the hopper, I have to weigh the table down to stop it from vibrating items off. Other Ice shavers the blade rotates, this one the blade is fixed and the ice is knocked around by a spinner and thrown against the blades, which is the reason for the bad vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Streich

customer_reviews.title: You will be super popular
customer_reviews.text: I ruled 4th of July like the baller I was born to be. This baby cranks out the freshie fluff powder at the speed of real fast! Super easy to use. There isn’t much cleaning if you stick to using ice cubes. I recommend buying both 4 and 6oz cups as the 6oz are a bit large for the little groms.
customer_reviews.author: Jaysa

customer_reviews.title: Great to have!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good machine over all. It really does shave the ice, I love it. The samples are super good and tasty but they are just that “samples” so they didn’t last at all. I do see the need to add some sort of tray on the bottom so the mess is less. Also, my machine moves because it shakes a little too hard every time I use it but I might Need to read more and see if I’m missing a step on the setup that makes this happen. Other than that it’s a great ice shaved to have for small events.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Small machine is a powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Summer parties and treats at the office. It could not be simpler to use. What is most impressive is how fast it works to shave ice and fill your cup! The syrup flavors are great! I have already purchased the larger sizes of syrup that come with the snow cone paper cups. This machine would be great for any party, you will glad you own it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.N.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy child=worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: When your child loves it...mom loves it. Very good quality. Delicious fluffy snow like snow cones. Small enough to store easily. A little loud but it’s grinding ice so it’s expected. I especially like that the company reached out to assure us if anything was not to our satisfaction they would make it right. How can you go wrong when they back their product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just like store bought shave ice
customer_reviews.text: Dude this is awesome. I cannot believe the quality of the shaved ice.... i never thought it would be like a shave ice place but it is. Is just like snow. Is noisy, but really its shaving ice so no noisier than should be expected. Safety feature is really cool too. Also seems really well made and sturdy. Would expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Sjt

customer_reviews.title: Like fresh fallen snow
customer_reviews.text: We have had a commercial snow cone machine for 30 years. Santa brought it when all the children were little. However, my husband and I enjoy shaved ice more than chuncky snow cones. The Little Snowie 2 ice shaver does exactly like the name says. It shaves the ice. The shaved ice is light and fluffy like snow that has just fallen. Speaking of fallen....to those using it the first time, be aware that the ice moves a lot to be shaved and the collection cone should be covered with your cup or snow and ice will go everywhere. I would suggest this machine to anyone that loves shaved ice!
customer_reviews.author: MommyT

customer_reviews.title: It is a real "snow" cone maker!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I thought it would be a lot bigger and was a little disappointed at first, but when I put ice in it my opinion changed. We have owned 3 different commercial snow cone makers and this is by far the easiest and fastest to use. I do recommend larger ice, I tried using crushed ice thinking it would work better but it did not. the bigger the ice the better snow you will get. No problems so far and it works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Makes snow shaved ice! I’ve looked and purchased numerous shaved ice machines only to end up with ice chunks. This is a true shaved ice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alysonn Bostic

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice albeit expensive snow cone maker. Pros: Works good Makes great snow Easy to operate Fast Cons: Loud Drips water Hard to get out leftover ice Overall as of now I would give a 4.5 if so could. If money is not an object and you like snowy ice this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Truly makes snow!
customer_reviews.text: Makes snow!!! This isn't some gimmicky snow cone machine, this machine gives you soft and fluffy snow that is gun to eat and frankly makes the ice you use taste delicious even without the syrup! Best part is, you don't need some special ice mold to can just use the use right out of your freezer!! Well worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Anastacio Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class in Use and Safety
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade to my $45 all metal model. Yes the show is like the real thing. Built with safety in mind too, safe for older kids to run. I know it's not supposed to be commercial model but the specs sure are. We use it on every Sunday when we do church outreach for the homeless. I am confident that it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gomban Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It’s the closest thing to Hawaiian shave ice I’ve had. A scoop of vanilla ice cream on the bottom is a extra treat. The only negative is the noise level. Our cat now runs when we get near the machine 😂
customer_reviews.author: debie

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I would like to thank this company. They went out of their way to ship this to me when I needed it. I was so impressed. I love it ,it is so easy to use.. the only thing I dont like so much is that it vibrates so much when on .but that is very understandable. Saves me so much money from renting from other companies. I OWN THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid. It feels like your grandmas mixer, probably weighs 20 pounds. The kids absolutely love it. Best purchase of the summer. And I have to think healthier than eating ice cream. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hof.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snow cone machine. They are made quickly and the ice is shaved fine. The only reason I give 4 vs 5 stars is because I can’t seem to find a cup to use with it that prevents ice from falling all over the counter when making them. Perhaps it should come with cups or maybe the design should be tweaked slightly to reduce this issue.
customer_reviews.author: jade mazzio

customer_reviews.title: treat on a hot day
customer_reviews.text: love this little gadget. Had to call in warranty info because the link was not working but enjoyed chatting with customer service. I had a few questions which she helped me with. Did not know the best size ice to use. Perfect time to buy this because the summer heat is starting
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Shave Ice Magic
customer_reviews.text: Powerful machine. works very well. used at birthday party but great enough to use commercially. 250 shave ice cones (small paper cups used) made and it kept working.
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Commercial quality at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is spectacular! It's as close to true fluffy shaved ice as you can get for less than a commercial machine and works so easily with regular ice cubes. It's so quick and easy to use and tastes so good. I have been looking for a shaved ice machine in my budget for years and the Little Snowie 2 ticks all the boxes
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great ice shaving machine! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great ice shaving machine. We loved using it and will continue to make treats in the winter. Only downfall is the noise and also it gets a bit messy when the ice is being shaved.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Best little machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! I've used it almost everyday since getting it. My children can use it on their own (11 & 7). The size is great for at home use. Fits right under my cabinets. It's a little loud, but it is shaving ice. So completely expected. So glad I finally decided to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: We love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and exactly as advertised. It makes quality snowcones that are wonderful. You can order with or without the flavors and accessories. We ordered the machine alone. This thing is LOUD, but it makes incredible snowcones. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crissie Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Best machine,use Hawaiian Shaved Ice flavor,for best taste
customer_reviews.text: I love my Little Snowie.I bought mine July 2018 and it has worked perfectly and still is.👍 it's a little noisy,but this is the best machine you can buy.easy to clean,easy to use and makes the best kine shave ice every time.to get any better you would need to spend $1000.00 + and then all you would get is a quieter machine.I now have made almost 1000 perfect shave ice.I take it every where and everyone always loves their shave ice. It is the best I can't say enough good about my Little Snowie.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This machine creates the best snow ever! It is convenient because it uses any regular ice cubes- no need for pre-frozen forms. The hopper is huge so you can create several LARGE snows before reloading. Customer service is awesome- they checked regularly to make sure I was satisfied with the product, or if I needed help. They take great pride in supporting their product and I would absolutely recommend the seller and the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S.

customer_reviews.title: Little Snowie 2
customer_reviews.text: update I've had this machine for over a year and survived several fundraisers and I don't know how many mixed drinks is made I'm still on my first set of blades Ok you been reading review and looking at posted questions about shaved ice machines. This makes snow!!! It truly does. Its easy to use and clean. Makes 8 oz in 5 seconds. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny4ever

customer_reviews.title: Best actual snow, snow cone machine
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are what you might call “snow cone snobs” lol we love snow cones but we want the texture of the snow cone to be much like snow. We don’t want it to be crunchy. Well we can confidently say that this is the BEST snow cone machine ever! It makes a perfect snow like texture snow cone. It is EXTREMELY easy to use and it’s not that big so it’s easy to store. The flavors it comes with are great too! We never write reviews but felt like we had to for this product because of how perfect it is! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hartle

customer_reviews.title: works but is VERY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: this is the most efficient snow cone machine i've had. it's also the loudest, so much so that i wear ear protection when using it. the noise and the lack of a "drip tray" for the leftover ice knocks it down a star for me. this thing does well to process the ice cubes. I use this at least a few times a week. i hope it holds up well for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaved Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to use, produces great shaved ice. Other machines aren't as consistent in the output but this is really good. Can make ices for 5 or 50 people easily. It is a little loud but that is expected. I would also like a better cone at the end. The shaved ice comes hurling out, and it takes a little practice to keep it all where you want it to go. A more directed shaped cone at the end could help this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kling

customer_reviews.title: This replaced another cheaper brand that I liked but it broke after 7 years
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another cheaper brand that I liked but it broke after 7 years. The newer version of that machine wasn't as good. it was a much cheaper machine that produced small pieces even though it was a shaver. So I balked at this more expensive product. But I watched the videos and had to give it a shot. Worth every penny. It makes fluffy soft snow. Like real snow. Uses regular cubes from the freezer. It's loud but it's so fast it doesn't matter. I'm 65 and love it. You can have a nice bowl for desert, 200 calories.
customer_reviews.author: rogwould

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and works great!
customer_reviews.text: The Snowie is totally awesome!! Works perfectly right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson III

customer_reviews.title: Really makes fine snow!!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a snow shaver which turned out ice chips. I used it to make shaved ice however the mouthfeel of the dessert was completely wrong. I decided to to give the little snowie a try although it was a bit expensive for single person to use at home. The ice texture it puts out is like the texture of real snow!! I absolutely love the machine. It puts out ice like real snow. Only drawback is that it is insanely loud while shaving the ice. I wear earplugs and the problem is solved. I just hope it lasts for long time!
customer_reviews.author: Akitalo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! You wonder if a snow cone machine will be worth $209. The answer with this one is a resounding yes! We had a cheaper Hawaiian ice one previously, and this one is FAR better. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B&S

customer_reviews.title: Essential for the summer entertainer.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best thing you can do for your summer. Kids love it. Add alcohol, adults love it. It’s pricey, but dare I say.... worth every penny. It’s noisy as hell, but now I associate the noise with joy, so it’s all good. This summer will be forever remembered as the one, when Daddy got the snow cone machine.
customer_reviews.author: hector knox

customer_reviews.title: fine ice - great product
customer_reviews.text: It makes a fine ice without chunks. It's small but definitely not a toy. The noise level is loud but you are grinding ice. I looked online at a lot of choices before buying this one. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GEW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday party and it was a huge hit! Easy to use, can use your own ice, and the texture is more shaved ice than snow cone! We have been enjoying it all summer! If you are on the fence, do it you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: csich2

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a neighborhood block party. Tonight I easily served around 60 snowcones over 3 hours. I went through 4 big bags of ice. So easy to use, and makes snow very quickly. Everyone wanted to know about it. We will get a lot of use from this handy dandy little machine. I will update if any issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walls

product_meta.title: Little Snowie Max Snow Cone Machine - Premium Shaved Ice Maker, With Powder Sticks Syrup Mix
feature_bullets: Patented and engineered for home use by the world leaders in commercial shaved ice machines, SNOWIE LLC, and backed by a no hassle 1 year.
Fastest home shaver on the planet makes perfect fluffy snow in 3 seconds with a professional grade High speed motor and 301 hardened stainless steel blade.
Conveniently SIZED snow cone machine for any home or office, holiday, birthday party or barbecue - easy to carry, easy to clean, Easy to store.
Ice shaver uses ice cubes straight from freezer or store (no time-consuming hassle of having to pre-freeze special shaped ice drums that take up valuable freezer space.)
The Little Snowie Standard Kit comes with 6 flavor powder sticks (makes 6 pints of syrup), 2 mixing bottle w/ pour spouts, and 8 Snowie shovels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,926 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
